notesStmt.note: "Herein is taught ... howe to draine moores, & al other wet grounds or bogges ... Also here is annexed the compasse and the seale ... and the computation of yeares from VVilliam the Conqueror."--First 10 lines of text.
Signed at end: Robertus Payne descripsit.
To the reader dated: From Paines End, the 16. of Nouember. 1583.
Imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: torn and cropped at bottom with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
